roleset.name: default, guess
roleset.note: GUESS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'guess' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. (from guess.01-v predicate notes)
GUESS-N NOTES: guess-n based on guess-v. (from guess.01-n predicate notes)

example.name: guess a wh-clause
example.text: Every day, [Mr. Levy]-2 checks orders from Campeau department store chains, [*-2]-3 trying [*-3] to guess if he will be paid [*-1] .

example.name: guess a regular sentence
example.text: ``I guess [0] we'll reluctantly go ahead and do it, vote for Dinkins,'' says [*T*-2]Richard Wade, a politically active professor who [*T*-1] supported Richard Ravitch, an also-ran in the Democratic primary.
example.arg: we'll reluctantly go ahead and do it, vote for Dinkins
